amendment.description: To continue cleaning up fields and streams while protecting neighborhoods, generating affordable energy, and creating jobs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 41, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 9.

action.text: Amendment SA 41 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S270; text: CR S270) To continue cleaning up fields and streams while protecting neighborhoods, generating affordable energy, and creating jobs.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 41, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 9.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 41, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 9.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 41 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 2.
